title: How to hide mobile friends?
body:
I have a large number of friends added (and i don't want to remove them) and it is very frustrating having to scroll past the mobile users to friends that I can actually invite to my game. 
I use friend groups to organize but this makes it so I have online friends below mobile friends.
Is there any way I can hide these mobile friends? If not when will this be a feature?

Thanks

replies.body: I don't believe that option is currently available, and I don't have any information on those features to offer.  Instead, I suggest posting this over to the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards to share your feedback with the client devs.  Thanks for helping with testing!
